channel.title: Short storie I wrote in school
channel.description: Never finished it because....well I am not sure, didn't really like it and I hate writing. Plus story is complete crap imo It's in RTF format which stands for RICH TEXT FORMAT, wrote it in WordPad obviously Figured i'd share it to get kicks,rated,hated w/e [url=http://www.laughingmansociety.net/The%20Speed%20of%20Darkness.rtf]The Speed of Darkness[/url]

item.title: Short storie I wrote in school
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

x.D Only read a couple paragraphs but you have common grammatical errors (would of -> would have). The story uh… I didn’t get the point, but that may be because I didn’t read the story.
